content.rendered:
A classical table that recalls the golden age of the English public house, the Hogarth features a glorious rococo-style base with a sturdy veneer top.

The black, three-legged base is fashioned from cast iron ensuring maximum stability. 

Available in three table top sizes and three quality wood finishes

Usually available within 10 working days.

This item requires basic self assembly.
